> <OLD>
>
> "everyone keep yours Eyes opened"said dryly while he waited for the
> troops"dont attak till I command it"

The others standing around Hydras grumble a bit at that command. They
had been collectively checking their weapons and getting ready for a
fight. Now they just glanced at Hydras, but none dared to voice an
opinion to their leader - Hydras' word was law to them.

Inferno stood closer to his leader ready to defend him, the rest of
them bracing themselves for what may be a battle!

Meanwhile seven tanks move quickly in Hydras' direction, they look to
each be large and powerfully built. The are primarily black and silver
with bits of crimson that seemed to almost glow eerily as the large
vehicles close in.

Finally they reach Hydras' is location and the lead tank shifts into
robot mode, a large soldier. If anything he is larger, with tracking
lights on either side of his head, multiple rocket and cannon mounts
on his massive chest and a large gun mount on his shoulder.

"I am Tankor." The soldier said simply, "You will be escorted to the
city." The other tanks surround Hydras and the others, their muzzles
pointed at the group making Tankor's command even more forceful!

Inferno made as if to step between Tankor to defend Hydras as the
others seemed ready to attack!

(TAG)
